actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that adjustments to the pay of Members of the Congress shall take effect at the beginning of the Congress following the Congress in which they are approved, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 and the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to direct that any adjustments in the rate of pay for Members of Congress shall take effect at the beginning of the Congress following the Congress in which they are approved.

titles.title: A bill to provide that adjustments to the pay of Members of the Congress shall take effect at the beginning of the Congress following the Congress in which they are approved, and for other purposes.
